Abstract: As the monks in their long black robes and golden sashes put the finishing touches on preparations for the New Year celebrations here, there was little room for doubt that this was a big day for Zojoji Temple, one of Tokyo's great Buddhist houses of worship.    There was the altar to be prepared in front of the huge bronze bell to be sounded 108 times to relieve the soul of its many agonies and frustrations.
LeadParagraph: As the monks in their long black robes and golden sashes put the finishing touches on preparations for the New Year celebrations here, there was little room for doubt that this was a big day for Zojoji Temple, one of Tokyo's great Buddhist houses of worship.

Headline.Main: Ancient Temple in Tokyo Rings In Just a New Year
Headline.PrintHeadline: 1/1/00: AROUND THE WORLD; Ancient Temple in Tokyo Rings In Just a New Year
